header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/compl.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a bit complement operator.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the bit complement of its operand.

usage.param: The value whose bit complement is to be produced. Valid values are 0 and 1.

macro.para: If bit is 0, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
